basics.name: Logan Grimsley
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Dynamic developer adept in building scalable features and fostering effective team collaboration. Highly motivated to architect and deliver purposeful, robust solutions. Active father to a wild toddler boy, and husband to a beautiful wife. Whether solving a complicated technical problem or playing computer games, I am most fulfilled when overcoming a challenge.

bullets: Initiated and led the front-end department as Frontend Architect, hiring and training developers to swiftly contribute to production.
Developed high-performance front-end applications with Nuxt 3/Vue 3 and robust APIs using Laravel, enhancing user engagement and operational efficiency.
Architected core infrastructure and services for system reliability and scale.
Led service uptime monitoring and optimization of systems, including conversion rate & CPC optimization, UX overhauls, and legacy system abstraction.
Collaborated with UX designers and leadership in creating scalable, user-centric features, contributing to a jump in company revenue from $30 million to $90 million annually.
Led the development team as CTO; improved efficiency and profitability by implementing Agile workflows.
As Senior Web Developer, led and executed projects over $200,000, showcasing exceptional technical acumen and an ownership mentality.
Developed and continuously improved a SaaS CRM system using Laravel.
Started as Junior Developer, quickly advancing by mastering WordPress, Magento, and Zend, and excelling in client management and upselling.

projects.name: Project Magic
projects.summary: AI Powered Jira Planning - SaaS Prototype
bullets: Developed a complex tool to automate Jira ticket generation using LLMs.
Designed comprehensive Jira integration with flexible custom field support.
Implemented parallel processing paradigms for scale and a responsive UX.
Generate a highly customizable set of tickets for a described project in seconds.
Technical Stack: TailwindCSS, Nuxt 3, Vue 3, Pinia, Laravel 10, MySQL, AWS.
